overview:
Pozitron is an award winning mobile software company founded in 2000. Pozitron’s mission is to help large companies to form a robust mobile presence while boosting up the speed and effectiveness of their business. Pozitron’s Mobile Development Platform (MDP) abstracts the complexities of the underlying device from application development and hence streamlines development on different mobile platforms. By using our unique technology, we produce mobile commerce, security and productivity solutions which are designed to improve customer experience. Region’s largest banks, airlines and pharmaceutical companies work with Pozitron to advance in mobile platform.

Pozitron Products:

Mobile Commerce Platform: Pozitron extended the scope of mobile commerce to mobile banking, betting and ticketing, creating value for the client by increasing transactions and loyalty through the mobile channel.

Mobile Sales Force: Mainly targeted to banks and pharmaceutical companies, our mobile sales force products improve sales efficiency of the sales force, save time and decrease costs.

Authentication: With Pozitron SoftKEY, users verify their identity conveniently yet securely using their mobile phones via two-factor authentication methods.
